TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but they start breathing helium and subsequently die just after sunrise.

I wish for 0.15.

You have a buggy, incomplete .15 test version now.

And because you are not supposed to have it, your store acc is deleted and you have to pay $500 to Squad.

I wish for being almost perfect

Granted, but your only flaw is something so terrible it makes you want to jump off a cliff.

I wish for fun!

Granted, you fall off worlds tallest slide and die

I wish for a cheese burger

Granted. The cheeseburger is, however, made of solid arsenic buns and a small grating of stilton.

I wish to be all powerful in every way.

Granted... but God decides to eliminate you because you get too powerful.

I wish for cookies!

Granted. You have feces-chip cookies.

I wish for wealth, fame and for glory to shine on my name. I also want love I can posess and for God and his angels to bless me.

((geddit?))

Granted, but it\'s just a dream.

I wish for paint.

Granted, its lead paint.

I wish I was in possession of a pie flavored pie, in order to create infinite pies.

You get a crumb of a pie, as you didn\'t specify how much pie.

I want an uncorruptible wish.

You failed to wish, therefore not granted.

I wish people would actually wish for wishes that were worth wishing for.

Granted, but all the wishes are wishes that cause you to be in horrible, horrible pain forever.

I wish for MOAR BOOSTERS

I wish... My hand would heal

HOWEVER:

It will be made of jelly and it will be floppy

Good enough?

It seems you don\'t read the rules... is it just my threads?

Cahrzy:

Granted, but you scare the life out of Jeb with an explosion.

I wish I would hit the next person with the sharp side of a tuna!

Granted, but I pull out an SMG and kill you afterwards.

I wish that this wish will be a wish that will not be corrupted.

Granted, but you are callously murdered for attempting to circumvent the inevitable corruption.

I wish I had a fish.

Granted, but I slap you with it.

I wish for bliss.

I grant it, but you get fat from eating it (It is a brand of chocolate)

I wish that my computer could run KSP (it is PowerPC)

Granted, But now youre computer has a virus.

I wish my joystick would work again :\'(

Granted, but it is possessed and doesn\'t always do what you want it to.

I wish for a cup.

Granted, but the cup is so big it eats you alive.

I wish for a puppy.

Granted, but it eats you alive.

I wish for a tiger cub.

Granted, but when it grows up you release it, and then a year later you come back to where you released it, expecting one of those 'happy reunion' type-things that happens in movies about animals. The tiger runs up to you, and you open your arms to hug it... And then it mauls you to death and eats your carcass.

I wish for more wishes!

Granted, but your wishes are constrained to those that inflict harm upon yourself.

I wish for a sadistic genie.

Granted, he turns you into a lamp

I wish I could go into space for real
